title: New: Bruno Major – The First Thing You See
content:
Bruno Major just ‘gets’ pop music.

His songwriting is crafted to near absolute perfection – whilst he clearly understands the nuances of his own vocal, showcasing a deliberate yet delicate amount of control on new track, The First Thing You See. Sure, it’s slightly cheesy, but it’s bound to make more than a few hearts crumble. Check it out below.
